plot: When Jordan's lost his girlfriend to a cross-county move, he freaks out his family and friends with his wacky ways to stay connected to the long gone Tamika.
title: "Just Jordan" Jordan's Got It Bad
plot_es: When Jordan's lost his girlfriend to a cross-county move, he freaks out his family and friends with his wacky ways to stay connected to the long gone Tamika.
plot_en: When Jordan's lost his girlfriend to a cross-county move, he freaks out his family and friends with his wacky ways to stay connected to the long gone Tamika.
